text: Café Opera is a café and nightclub in Stockholm, Sweden. It is a bistro, brasserie and tea house during the day, and a popular nightclub at night. It opened in 1980. The club is also a former football club named FC Café Opera, founded in 1991. The club play in the Swedish Second League until 2005 Category:1980 establishments in Sweden Category:Swedish restaurants Category:Entertainment venues Category:Buildings and structures in Stockholm
title: Café Opera
